name: Bramblin
description: The Tumbleweed Pokémon. A soul unable to move on to the afterlife was blown around by the wind until it got tangled up with dried grass and became a Pokémon.

abilities.name: Wind Rider
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to damage dealt by wind moves. Additionally, this Pokémon's movement speed is double when moving with the wind's current direction, and halved when moving against the wind.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.
